defs.name: main_threaded
defs.docs: Marks async function to be executed by selected runtime.

attributes.value: / Marks async function to be executed by selected runtime.
/ - `max_threads=n` - Sets max threads to `n` (requires `rt-core` or `rt-threaded` feature).
/ Arguments are allowed for any functions aside from `main` which is special

defs.name: main
defs.docs: Marks async function to be executed by selected runtime.

attributes.value: / Marks async function to be executed by selected runtime.
/ - `basic_scheduler` - All tasks are executed on the current thread.
/ - `threaded_scheduler` - Uses the multi-threaded scheduler. Used by default (requires `rt-threaded` feature).
/ Arguments are allowed for any functions aside from `main` which is special

defs.name: main_basic
defs.docs: Marks async function to be executed by selected runtime.

attributes.value: / Marks async function to be executed by selected runtime.
/ Arguments are allowed for any functions aside from `main` which is special

defs.name: test_threaded
defs.docs: Marks async function to be executed by runtime, suitable to test environment

attributes.value: / Marks async function to be executed by runtime, suitable to test environment
/ - `max_threads=n` - Sets max threads to `n` (requires `rt-core` or `rt-threaded` feature).

/ - `basic_scheduler` - All tasks are executed on the current thread. Used by default.

defs.name: select_priv_declare_output_enum

Implementation detail of the `select!` macro. This macro is **not** intended
 to be used as part of the public API and is permitted to change.
